PHRASE.LANG: kName
Seaside Coconut Crab
Crabe de cocotier de bord de mer
Küsten-Kokosnuss-Krabbe
Granchio costiero da noce di cocco
Cangrejo cocotero en la costa
海辺のヤシガニ
해안의 야자게
Seaside Coconut Crab
海邊的椰子蟹
海邊的椰子蟹
Seaside Coconut Crab
kDesc
A large coconut crab that likes to hang out near the sea.\nIt loves company so it will come running after you if you move away. [#Legal]
Un gros crabe de cocotier qui aime se balader près de la mer.\nIl aime la compagnie alors il risque de vous courir après si vous vous éloignez. [#Legal]
Eine riesige Kokosnuss-Krabbe, die es mag sich in Küstennähe herumzutreiben.\nSie mag Gesellschaft und wird versuchen dir nachzulaufen, wenn du dich entfernst. [#Legal]
Un granchio da noce di cocco molto grande che si aggira per il bagnasciuga.\nAdora la compagnia, per cui ti inseguirà se ti allontanerai da lui. [#Legal]
Un gran cangrejo cocotero al que le gusta estar cerca del mar.\nLe encanta la compañía por lo que vendrá corriendo detrás de ti si te alejas. [#Legal]
海辺を徘徊する、大きなヤシガニ。\n寂しがり屋で、あなたが離れると走って追いかけてきます。[#Legal]
해안을 배회하는 큰 야자게. \n외로움을 많이 타며, 당신이 멀어지면 달려서 따라옵니다.[#Legal]
A huge coconut crab that wanders by the sea.\nIt craves company and dashes towards you whenever you walk away.[#Legal]
在海邊徘徊的大椰子蟹。\n牠很怕寂寞，只要你走開便會追著你走。[#Legal]
在海邊徘徊的大椰子蟹。\n牠很怕寂寞，只要你走開便會追著你走。[#Legal]
A large coconut crab that likes to hang out near the sea.\nIt loves company so it will come running after you if you move away. [#Legal]
